titles.title: Authorizing the Clerk to inform the President of the election of the Speaker and the Clerk.
Authorizing the Clerk to inform the President of the election of the Speaker and the Clerk.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution instructs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to inform the President that the House has elected Kevin McCarthy and Cheryl L. Johnson as Speaker of the House and Clerk, respectively.
